entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
